parameters: You found the engraving "Satan Presiding at the Infernal Council" (1824) by John Martin!
"Lucifer" means "morning star". He rebelled against God because _.
Scripture is unclear on Lucifer's motives. He might have been influenced by all of these reasons.
Scripture is unclear on Lucifer's motives. He might have been influenced by all of these reasons.
Scripture is unclear on Lucifer's motives. He might have been influenced by all of these reasons.
Scripture is unclear on Lucifer's motives. He might have been influenced by all of these reasons.
Maybe we should turn around? Of course, if you want to fight, I'm with you. Loyal like the soon-to-be-created dog!
What did Merutsa mean about humans loving in a way that we can't? And what did she mean by humans having children?
Aren't we all children of the Creator? Aren't humans made just like we are?
Doesn't the Creator shape you in His hands and breathe life into you just like He does us?
That's how He described it to me when He was talking about Adam.
Of course, maybe Merutsa heard about something that I didn't! I wish I hadn't missed that part!
I do remember that He said He was going to make Eve a little differently.
Oh, is every human made in a unique way? How were you made, \N[3]? Was it different from Steve?
Is the Creator still making humans on earth? How many humans are there?
It is strange to think that the angels serve us. They are much more powerful than we are.
The angels don't serve us; they serve God.
Why do the angels serve us?
Let's talk about it more later.
The angels don't serve us; they serve God.
Right. But they serve God by helping us.
In the book of Hebrews, it says something like, "the angels are ministering spirits sent to serve those who will be saved."
And Paul says somewhere that we will judge the angels. That's pretty crazy.
Why do the angels serve us?
I guess it's because they have the ability. The stronger has to help the weaker.
Plus, God tends to teach His creatures how to be humble by asking them to serve others.
When the angels serve us, it's a help to us and a lesson to them.
Let's talk about it more later.
